Articles.Content:
Which forum / subforum would be appropriate for showing a web app trajectory calculator (for aerobraking) that I made? It's not a 'Mod' in that it's just a site with some javascript.

Thanks!

Welcome Aboard CFE, the best place to put it would be in 

[Tools and Applications](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/36-Tools-and-Applications)

Many thanks and I hope you have a good time here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome aboard! I'd love to see this calculator, I've been collecting bookmarks of internet KSP tools.
Hello, nice to meet you! I'm newbie too !

Welcome to the forums, both of you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
